name: The more you know (EN)
description:
After 3 months, I've finally translated the game into English. It took only one day to do but I'm afraid there are still some errors in the dialogues. Please contact me asap so I can work on it. If you're interested, I put the translation file in the game. You can look around if you understand Vietnamese <3

This is a short RPG game about Lily Katherine, a 17-year-old girl.

The game takes 20 to 40 minutes to finish. There are 2 main endings and a secret ending.

And no, this is not a horror game.

Note: I lost the file to make the game so I was happy to find an alternative way to do the translation. Even though there are some part is still being kept in another language, I hope it won't affect much to the game.

I had to change the hint to the puzzle as well. If it's difficult to understand, like I said, please contact me through my social media. I put it in the walkthrough file.
